[Info] Diablo RuneWords

Please direct connect to the server.  Its easy to do, and it helps reduce lag for other players.  

Server IP:  82.176.246.22 :5121

You must add the port when direct connecting.  If you have any questions or concerns about using a direct connection please contact a DM.  This server is based in The Netherlands.  We ask that you try and use a HIGH SPEED connection.  Thank you once more.

Grtz, Henk...
[Info] Diablo Server Direct Connect

Serverules (full version) can be found on the website, in the journal are only some basic rules. If you are unsure about something look at the serverrules on the website for the full description.

1. Respect others in the game and that means everyone from the DMs to the people you really can't stand.

2. Try not to shout unless you have something important to say.

3. This server is for role players as well as hack 'n' slash so try to stay in character. 

4. You will not be booted out or banned from the game just for voicing your opinion about the mod, however you can be booted or banned if you slam people or anything that may be offensive to the masses and inappropriate. so use some better judgment.

5. Player vs. Player - Simple rules if you wish to player vs. player you need to keep it in character and both parties must be agreed to the fight. if you Pk on a regular basis and its out of role play and you are doing it against the wishes of the other player then you will be warned and the next offense will get you banned permanently and your player characters will be deleted. 
 
6. Threats against the Server or anyone Playing in it. I have heard people get mad at DMs and start spouting that they will crash the server and that will get you a one way ticket to Bannedville. Also making threats againt other players will not be tolerated (now I am speaking of real life threats not saying your going to hunt their character down and kill them cause they accidently hit you with a spell) But this will also get you a one way ticket to Bannedville.

7. Using Profanity - Ok here is the base of it all. Don't shout out cuss words, Dont speak them in public if your going to offend someone. Just try to have some taste and tact and don't offend anyone. 

8. Steeling/Pickpocket from other players is not alloud.
[Info] Diablo Server Rules Part One

9. Spel casting in town against other players and NPC's is not alloud. (Buffs are alloud)

10. Using known and unknown bugs in the game is not alloud.

11. Duping items is not alloud (item copy bug).

12. Steeling drops from players who just killed a boss is not alloud. 

13. The server is english based so please talk english, it is alloud to talk your one language in a party chat channel

14. Dungeon Master's are not responsable for losing items after a reset or crash of the server. 

15. When you get yourself killed in-game please accept this, get someone to res you, but dont use the logout/login bug from neverwinter to avoid the consiquensies from the death script.

16. To help yourself and other players there are some thinks you can do to reduce server lag as much as possible. (Examples are 1. Don't drop items on the floor in rogue encampment or other city's, please put them into the trashcan. 2. Try to kill the monsters that you spawn, don't run arround in the world spawning monsters without killing them. 3. Try to direct connect to the server. 4. Try to avoid login/logout to many times in a short period of time) we are not running a hard policy about this rule but it might get you into jail when you disregard the rule.

17. Jumping others to waypoints to rush the game is not alloud.

18. It is not forbidden to play with your high-end gear in lower Acts. Remember that it is nice to have [Epic], [Victory], [Uber] and [Hell] tagged items but for the best game experience try to play with the items that are tagged for that Act, it will give you the most balance and fun to play.

19. Give new players a change to play the game in his full experience. So please don't give high-rank gear to new players, we can not always avoid that from happening but we don't encourage it. Items can be removed by a Dungeon Master when noticed.

20. Try and have fun that's what were all here for.
[Info] Diablo Server Rules Part Two

15-05-2011: Act I
Underground Passage Level 1 redesign area
Rogue Encampment change to summer theme
Dark Wood (East Entrance) redisgn area

Please visit the website at http://www.worldofsanctuary.nl for more information about module updates. (site is in english)

Go down into the Barrows and find the Ancient Hall Of Heroes, be carefull the barrows are filled with evil monsters. In the Hall of Heroes you wil find the first Hellgate that you need to close. When you have closed the gate talk to Quov Tsin in Scosglen Encampment.
You have closed the gate in the Barrows
[Quest] Ancient Hall Of Heroes

It is certain that we face the demon queen, Andariel, who has corrupted the Rogue Sisterhood and defiled their ancestral Monastery. This does not bode well for us, my friend.
Ancient Horadric text record that Andariel and the other Lesser Evils once overthrew the three Prime Evils -- Diablo, Mephisto and Baal -- banishing them from Hell to our world.
Here, they caused mankind untold anguish and suffering before they where finally bound within the Soulstones. Andariel's presence here could mean that the forces of Hell are once again aligned behind Diablo and his Brothers. If this is true, then fear for us all. You must kill her before the Monastery becomes a permanent outpost of Hell and the way east lost forever.

When you have killed Andariel bring here head to Warriv !
You have Killed Andariel and may travel with Warriv's caravan to Lut Gholein and Act Two.
[Quest] Andariel
Find the portal to the Arcane Sanctuary on the third level of the Harem Cellar of the Palace. Talk to Cain if you have found the Waypoint Scroll in the Arcane Sanctuary.
You have found the Arcane Sanctuary
[Quest] Arcane Sanctuary

To get the last and ninth gateseal you need to find the Ascension. Sometimes somewhere in the World of Sanctuary a portal is opend that gives access to this secret area. The people of Sanctuary do not know where or when the portal is opend but you could ask arround in the city's and encampments to get more information about the ninth gateseal. In the meantime keep your eyes open for the messenger. if you find and closed the ninth gateseal go back to Quov Tsin in the Scosglen Encampment
You have given a lead that bring you closer to the ninth hellgate, go to the Aranoch desert and search the ruines of the Broken Pillar to get the answer where you are looking for.
You have closed the gate in the Ancension
[Quest] Ascension
Ashl guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, has the first Worldstone piece, find Ashl and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Ashl is somewhere in the claw viper temple.
Ashl guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the first Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Ashl
Bael guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, has the sixth Worldstone piece, find Bael and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Bael is somewhere in Frigid Highlands.
Bael guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the sixth Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Bael
Belial, Lord of Lies, has the seventh Worldstone piece, find Belial and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Beliall is somewhere in the Kingsport Halls.
Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the seventh Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Belial
You must go to his lair through the door downstairs in Anya's House, kill Nihlathak, and then bring back the Relic of the Ancients to Anya.
You have killed Nihlathak.
[Quest] Betrayal of Harrogath
Go to the Burial Grounds and kill Blood Raven, bring her head back to Kashya !
You have killed Blood Raven
[Quest] Blood Raven
Blunderbore guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, has the fourth Worldstone piece, find Blunderbore and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Blunderbore is somewhere in The Halls of Pain.
Blunderbore guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the fourth Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Blunderbore
Find the Caverns Of Time en close the gate that was opend from the demon world.
You have closed the gate in the Caverns Of Time, go to the north of the Island and talk to Zaro.
Your quest on the Island Of Lycander is done.
[Quest] Caverns Of Time
You have meet with Quov Tsin in the Ruins of Ureh, he ask you to go down in the catacombs of the old temple ruins to search for the Crystal of Shadow
You have found the Crystal of Shadow
[Quest] Crystal of Shadow

There is a place of great evil in the wilderniss. Kashy's Rogue scouts have informed me that a cave nearby is filled with shadowy creatures and horrors from beyond the grave. I fear that these creatures are massing for an attack against our encampment. If you are sincere about helping us. find the dark labyrinth and destroy the foul beasts.

Go to the Blood Moor, search for a place called the Den of Evil and search for my ring that i have lost there, when we where forced to leave that cave. I should add that many Rogue scouts have died in that horrible place. We cannot afford to lose any more. If you choose to enter that Den of Evil, you must do so alone.

May the Great Eye watch over you.
You have deliverd the ring to Akara, You have been given a key to enter the Cold Plains.
[Quest] Den of Evil
Destory the Worldstone in the Worldstone Chamber
[Quest] Destruction of the Worldstone
Move down through the three levels of the Worldstone Keep, then through the Throne of Destruction and Kill Baal and his Guardians.
You have killed Baal and his Guardians
[Quest] Eve of Destruction

Go back in the Catacombs of the City of Ulreh to defeat the evils in there lairs. To get access to the lair of the evils, you need there soulstones to open the door to there cript. After you defeated the evils your quest is done. Before entering the Tombs of Evil be sure you got all the soulstones from the evils on you. You may enter hell again to get the soulstones from the first seven evils then first kill Horazon and then Bartuc for there soulstones. When you have collected all eleven Victory Tokens talk to Quov Tsin in Temple of the City of Ureh.

... You have completed the game, thanks for playing on this server i hope you have fun playing here on the "Diablo II - Lord of Destruction" NeverWinter Nights server. When you have all Victory Tokens on your char please make contact with one of the DM's to get your name in the Hall of Monuments  ...
[Quest] Final Battle
To get the next gateseal you need to travel through the Vrybenganon's temple and the Halls make your way to the Halls of Horror and close the eighth gate.
You have closed the gate in the Halls of Horror.
[Quest] Hall of Horror

Explore the holy grounds and defeat the souls of the Prime Evils to get there soulstones. Once you have collect all the soulstones you need to destroy them on the Hellforge in the River of Flame.
Before you can destory the soulstones talk to the Fallen Angel in the Temple of Portals.
You have defeated the Prime Evils and took there soulstones. You now need to go to River of Flame and destroy the collected soulstones on the Hellforge.
[Quest] Holy Grounds
The Horadric Scroll is found on level three of the Halls of the Dead, a dungeon area below the Dry Hills. Bring it back to Cain !
You have found the Horadric Scroll and returned it to Cain !
[Quest] Horadric Scroll
Hunt Bartuc down and get is soulstone by killing him, he is somewhere hiding in the World of Sanctuary, Rogue Encampment seems to be a good place to start your hunt.
You have killed Bartuc in the Palace and took his soul stone
[Quest] Hunt for Bartuc

Go to the Arcane Sanctuary and stop Horazon, the Brothers are planning a new war against the World of Sanctuary, take his soulstone and bring it back to Quov Tsin who is in the Temple of the City of Ureh.
You have killed Harazon in the Arcane Sanctuary and took his soul stone
[Quest] Hunt for Horazon
To get to the next gateseal you need to travel through the Highlands of Scosglen to the northern parts of the World of Sanctuary find the Ice blade Hold and close the seventh gate.
You have closed the gate in the Ice Blade Hold
[Quest] Ice Blade Hold
Ixil guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, has the fifth Worldstone piece, find Ixil and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Ixil is somewhere in Arreat Plateau.
Ixil guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the fifth Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Ixil
Search for Khalim's Brain, in a chest on level two of the sewers, beneath Lower Kurast.
You have found Khalim's Brain.
[Quest] Khalim's Brain
Search for Khalim's Eye, in the Spider Cavern beneath the Spider Forest
You have found Khalim's Eye.
[Quest] Khalim's Eye
Search for Khalim's Flail, It's carried by a High Council member in Travincal
You have found Khalim's Flail.
[Quest] Khalim's Flail
Search for Khalim's Heart in the Flayer Dungeon beneath the Flayer Jungle.
You have found Khalim's Heart.
[Quest] Khalim's Heart

To get access to the worldstone chamber you must defeat Zalashijs who is hiding in his den in the desert of Aranoch. Find his den and destroy him, Zalashijs hold the key that give access to the worldstone chamber in Mount Arreat behind baals throne room where the worldstone is once been found. This is the place where the pieces can be destoyed and closing the gates from hell for ever, but be carefull this is also the place where evil can put the stone together and the Sanctuary will be lost. Go now <FirstName> and find and destroy Zalashijs and travel to Mount Arreat to meet Deckard Cain in the worldstone chamber.
You have defeated Zalashijs and have access to the worldstone chamber.
[Quest] Mount Arreat
Kill Azmodan, Lord of Sin at the peak of Mount Karcheus.
You have killed Azmodan, Lord of Sin.
[Quest] Mount Karcheus
Quav Tsin asked you to find the temple of Viz-Jun. Ask the local people in the village of Viz-Jun for more information. The village can be found in the north of the Great Marsh forest in Kehjistan
Follow the Argentek river to the ruins of the temple of Viz-Jun.
You have found Prince Albrecht, take him back to Quav Tsin in the temple of the City of Ureh
You have saved Prince Albrecht.
[Quest] Prince Albrecht
Look for Anya under the Crystalline Passage by the Frozen River.
You have found, and free Anya.
[Quest] Prison of Ice
Kill Radament, he is hiding in the sewers below Lut Gholien, take is sword to Atma for your reward.
You have killed Radament.
[Quest] Radament's Lair
Regal guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, has the thirth Worldstone piece, find Regal and take the Worldstone piece from him, it is told Regal is somewhere in The Mausoleum
Regal guardian of Belial, Lord of Lies, is fallen and you have the thirth Worldstone piece.
[Quest] Regal
Travel through the Crystalline Passage to the Glacial Trial and the Frozen Tundra to get access to the Ancients's Way to find the Ancients at the Arreat Summit.
You have killed the Ancients and have access to the Worldstone Keep.
[Quest] Rite of Passage
Find the Ruines of Alterac en close the gate that was opend from the demon world. You must past the City Of Yasun but be carefull great evil has taken the city.
You have closed the gate in the Temple Of Alterac, go back to the Village Of Rathma and talk to Tyrande Whisperwind.
Tyrande Whisperwind has give you the key that gives acces to the sewers of the Temple Of Yasun.
[Quest] Ruines Of Alterac
Follow the road to the east from the High Field Grass. In the Ruines of the High Fields Necrihd opend a gate from the demon world. Now he is dead the gate can be closed by a mortal.
Close the gate that was opend by Necrihd from the demon world to save the lands of the High Field Grass.
You have closed the gate that was opend by Necrihd in the Ruines of the High Fields.
[Quest] Ruines of the High Field
Search for the Dragcous's Lair in the Dark Wood
[Quest] Rune Quest 1
Search for Blargnax's in the Mines in Upper Kurast.
[Quest] Rune Quest 10
Search for Ironclaw in The Baths of Lut Gohlien, you need a diving suite, flippers and helm to access this area.
[Quest] Rune Quest 11
Search for the Dark Wanderer in Nihlathak's Crypts Of Dead
[Quest] Rune Quest 12
Search for the Caraec's Lair in the Dry Hills
[Quest] Rune Quest 2
Search for the Gugvaruva in the Temple in the Flayer Jungle
[Quest] Rune Quest 3
Search for the Bonezine's Lair in the Bloody Foothills
[Quest] Rune Quest 4
Search for the Dreddlord's Lair in the Nuxious Lair in the Aranoch Desert
[Quest] Rune Quest 5
Search for the Fear Of The Dark in Diablo's Castle
[Quest] Rune Quest 6
Search for The Rock of Vex in the City of Ureh (Emporium) and for The Furious in the Ciry of Ureh (Castle)
[Quest] Rune Quest 7
Search for the Cartituku Araneae, it is told he is somewhere in the caverns of the monastery, the caverns can be found in the church of the monastery.
[Quest] Rune Quest 8
Search for the Desert Temple in Far Oasis there are some intresting runes to be found there.
[Quest] Rune Quest 9

Travel from the Stony Fileds through the Underground Passageway to the Dark Woods, Find the Tree of Inifuss and click on it to get the Scroll of Inifuss, Bring back the scroll to Akara, You need to defeat Blood Raven first, to get access to the Dark Wood !

You have found the Scroll of Inifuss, and deleverd the scroll to Akara. From Akara you have got a key that gives access to the Field of Stone's. The magical stones give access to the City of Tristram.
[Quest] Scroll of Inifuss

Legend speaks of a long-dead city known as Ureh, thought by many to have been a gateway to the High Heavens. It is believed that every two thousand years, when the stars align and the shadow of Mount Nymyr falls upon the ruins, Ureh is reborn and all its lost riches are revealed to those brave enough to seek them out. the Vizjerei sorcerer, Quov Tsin, told that he has witness Ureh's rebirth himself. Quov Tsin is last seen in Kurast when he left the harbour with Meshif, the ship's captain. Talk to Meshif to get more information about Quov Tsin.
Search for the Vizjerei sorcerer, Quov Tsin in Ureh.
You have found Quov Tsin in Ureh.
[Quest] Search for Quov Tsin
Cain ask you to find Charsi Smithing Hammer in the Barracks inside the Monastery.
You have deliverd the Smithing Hammer to Charsi.
[Quest] Smithing Hammer
Travel to the High Field Grass and kill the demons, To save the Village of Relath you must kill Necrihd, the soultrader from hell.
You have saved the Village of Relath from the soultrader from hell "Necrihd"
[Quest] Souls for Trade
The Staff of Kings is found in the Queen Maggot on level three of the Sand Maggot Hive, found below the Far Oasis. Bring it back to Cain !
You have found the Staff of Kings and returned it to Cain !
[Quest] Staff Of Kings
You must find Shenk the Overseer, and kill him, and bring his whip to Larzuk.
You have killed Shenk the Overseer.
[Quest] Stop the Siege
Talk to Greiz, about the The Seven Tombs.
You have talked to Greiz, about The Seven Tombs.
[Quest] Talk to Greiz
Talk to Juston, about the Souls for Trade.
You have talked to Juston, about the Souls for Trade.
[Quest] Talk to Juston
Talk to Timon, about the Gateseals.
You have talked to Timon, about the Gateseals.
[Quest] Talk to Timon
Search for the gate of hell in Terror Run and close it.
You have closed the last gate from hell on the Amazon Island.
[Quest] Terror Run
You must defeat Diablo, Diablo is found in the Chaos Sanctuary, and you must release him by opening the seals you find around the level. There are five seals in three locations.
You have defeated Diablo.
[Quest] Terror's End

Comment.value: You have found the Blade of the Old Religion.

value.0: Search the Blade of the Old Religion in the Spider Forest.
You have found the Blade of the Old Religion.
[Quest] The Blade of the Old Religion

Tag.value: The Blade of the Old Religion

value.0: Find Izual in the Plains of Despair.
You have killed Izual.
[Quest] The Fallen Angel
Find the Jade Figurine in the Spider Forest and show it to Alkor.
You found the Jade Figurine and brought it to Alkor.
[Quest] The Golden Bird
On the third level of the Durance of Hate you'll find Mephisto. You must kill him to gain access to the Hell Gate, the portal to Act Four.
You have killed Mephisto.
[Quest] The Guardian
You must destroy the Soulstone you got from Mephisto on the Hellforge.
You have destroy the Soulstone you got from Mephisto on the Hellforge.
[Quest] The Hellforge

Now that Belial, Lord of Lies is defeated the Sanctuary is save for the moment. You have found seven pieces of the worldstone, but there have been told that there are three more pieces to be found in the great desert of Aranoch. Cain does not know where the pieces are or that they allready have been taken by evil creators, go into the desert and search for the last three pieces. After you found the last pieces talk to Cain in Duncraig.
You have found the last three Worldstone Pieces.
[Quest] The Last Pieces

Close the first Hellgate in the High Field Grass.
Close the second Hellgate in the Ruines Of Alterac.
Close the thirth Hellgate in the Caverns Of Time.
Close the fourth Hellgate in Terror Run.

Talk to Quov Tsin when you have the lost four Gateseals and the Fifth one from the Barrows.
You have closed the first five Gateseals.
[Quest] The Lost Seals
Find Tal Rasha's Tomb, beneath the true tomb in the Canyon of the Magi, and kill Duriel, go back to Lut Gholien and speak to Meshif, the ship's captain.
You have killed Duriel and may travel with Meshif, the ship's captain, to Kurast and Act Three.
[Quest] The Seven Tombs
The Summoner is found at the tip of one of the four points of the Arcane Sanctuary, Kill him and take the portal to the Canyon of the Magi, take the scroll of the waypoint and talk to Drognan !
You have killed The Summoner
[Quest] The Summoner
The Viper Amulet is found in the Claw Viper Temple, the entrance to the temple is in the Valley of Snakes, a small surface area off of the Lost City. Bring it back to Cain !
You have found the Viper Amulet and returned it to Cain !
[Quest] The Viper Amulet

There where never three brothers but four, and one of them is a mortal as yourself, the fourth brother is send to the Sanctuary to get the trust of the mortal's who never had a change... Cain is the fourth brother and he is going to destroy you... Cain opend the gate to hell itself... with the power of the Wordlstone the spirit's of the three brothers once again can be united. Enter Hell itself and destroy the Prime Evil once and for all.

You have defeated the four brothers of evil.

Legend speaks of a long-dead city known as Ureh, thought by many to have been a gateway to the High Heavens. It is believed that every two thousand years, when the stars align and the shadow of Mount Nymyr falls upon the ruins, Ureh is reborn and all its lost riches are revealed to those brave enough to seek them out. the Vizjerei sorcerer, Quov Tsin, told that he has witness Ureh's rebirth himself. Quov Tsin is last seen in Kurast when he left the harbour with Meshif, the ship's captain.
[Quest] Three Brothers

You must go into the Barrows again and go to the door that gives access to the lower part of this Encampment. Across the water is a bridge that gives access to the old city of Túr Dúlra. You need to go to the old city of Túr Dúlra and destroy the Hellgate.
You have closed the gate in Túr Dúlra
[Quest] Túr Dúlra
